oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Alexandria, Department of Survey and Mines
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Egypt. Maṣlaḥat al-Misāḥah wa-al-Manājim
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Three sheets of Alexandria from 1940 map published by the Department of Survey & Mines. Sections consist of Abu Qîr, El Muntazah, and Alexandria. Sheet numbers 95/525, 94/495, 95/510
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Abū Qīr (Egypt) -- Maps; Alexandria (Egypt) -- Maps
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Rare Books and Special Collections Library; the American University in Cairo
